subject: Concussions
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Brian Boucher stopped 35 shots as the Flyers’ new starting goalie to help Philadelphia grab a first-round playoff series lead with a 4-2 win over the host Buffalo Sabres on Monday.
snippet: Brian Boucher stopped 35 shots as the Flyers’ new starting goalie to help Philadelphia grab a first-round playoff series lead with a 4-2 win over the host Buffalo Sabres on Monday.
